caption: Best public park in the 7th, selon moi. As others have said, it is a lovely oasis, walled off from the streets without feeling closed in. And shockingly, not only are jeux de ballons NOT strictement interdits, there is a lawn RÉSERVÉE aux jeux de ballons des jeunes enfants!! Delightful

A beautiful tiny park, dogs not allowed so very clean and perfect for picnics and read and get. Not very far from le bonne marche. Middays could be loud because children love to come in groups and play. Facilities and drink water fountain are available.
I love coming here all year long. The gardens are beautiful with every season. It feels like a hidden oasis.
What a lovely place to spend some quiet fun time with little ones. Absolutely fabulous park, complete with toilets.
Warm friendly park full of local activity.  Many benches and a nice stop between the Rodin Museum and the Pantheon
A great little park, tucked out of the way in central Paris. Our 6-year-old loved exploring the allotments, gardens and, of course, the playground!
Lovely little park. Plenty of shade under the vines on a sunny day.

Visited twice in July 2023 - a lovely place to stop, relax, and enjoy the flowers.  A colourful oasis with refreshing shade much needed on our tourist walk-about.  Gardens were well cared for.  Benches were available.  Shaded areas under trees and a long grapevine trellis.  Flowers were lovely.  Fruit trees were unique.  A lovely little book lending stand.  Free drinking/washing water from a tap beside the washrooms.  Two public toilets - appeared clean, but had no paper supplies.
Super park for babies and children. Lovely grassed area with trees oroviding some shade for picnics and play aswell as a playground.
A great and secluded garden just off the back of the French Prime Minister's residence. Carefully pruned beautiful flowers
A serene and beautifully maintained garden-park in Paris. Worth a visit, especially in the spring or fall.
A treasured place on my visits to Paris. Lush green lawns for picnics. A nice play space for kids with a playground and a sandpit and an amazing green tunnel to run under. Love it here!!!

A very different sort of park, it's small and filled with various fruit trees and vegetables. An arched walkway provides welcoming shade under the grape vines. Definitely worth peeking in or taking a picnic lunch here to enjoy nature and zen out from the business of Paris.
Lovely gardens to look at! This place also has a public washroom, if that's what you're looking for.  Benches to sit on, playground, vine walkway, beautiful park overall.
A beautiful and calm medium size public garden. Kids can play around while adults can enjoy a calm environment.
A quite tranquil park, good for small children, humans in general and runners.
Lovely garden with a play ground, grass to sit on, and a communal vegetable growing area.
One of our favorite place. Quite a d peaceful
Beautiful little park, used by lots of local nurseries

Walking down a back street we saw a sign and a gate in the wall. Entering this oasis in the middle of the city was amazing.  I realise that it's not on many lists but I would recommend any intrepid walker to take a water bottle (with pastis) a sandwich and a book.  In the centre of the city, it's a great place to unwind for an hour in between sites.
Secluded little garden, calm and my kind of place.
Closed until 12 October2024 for works project.
Beautiful little park that's off the beaten path. Lovely little vegetable gardens and fruit trees too. First time I've ever laid eyes on a Quince tree!
A beautiful garden, really peaceful, lots of seats, well maintained full of flowers. Great place to stop and eat lunch if you're in the area.
A great spot for small kids and for a family picnic. Public toilets too which is a plus. Playground and open park space tucked away in a small Paris Street.
My favorite garden in the 7th arrondissement. Very beautifull, the time seems suspended in the XVIIth Century. Perfect for kids , there are garden inside and its a very Green and quiet area.
Cosy park, near by schools & nurseries.
Small lil garden within central. Multi family is having their picnic and dinner gathering here. Great place to chill
Small and quaint. God great pics of grapes on the vine. Relaxing and a great stop for outdoor lunch or just to take a load off your feet.
Enchanting green pit stop, very well maintained... There is also a very useful bathroom even if it's servicing is a little bit understimate
Very very beautiful and peaceful place to rest. Babys are so cute!
Nice precious place in the large city
Beautiful green spot in the heart of the 7th, busy on the weekend for the locals love to picnic there, very lively
Family garden , plesure to see it is not polited like other parks with young lads drinking and loud music.
Pretty little park, very quiet (I visited in a weekday)
Very relaxing parc! You can enjoy a small nap in the middle of the nature!
Beautiful hidden garden. I loved it!
Pretty little oasis in the heart if bustling Paris. Great spot for a quiet picnic.
